formattedAddress: 16 Ericsson Pl, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 16 Ericsson Pl, New York, NY 10013-2411, USA

originalText.text: With all the hustle & bustle of the Big Apple, it’s no surprise that NY’s finest are on the scene. It’s always reassuring to know how calm, cool, & collected this department is. The world may seem to have been turned on it’s head, but it’s obvious that this department keeps putting the right foot forward.

text.text: With all the hustle & bustle of the Big Apple, it’s no surprise that NY’s finest are on the scene. It’s always reassuring to know how calm, cool, & collected this department is. The world may seem to have been turned on it’s head, but it’s obvious that this department keeps putting the right foot forward.

originalText.text: Honestly, I wonder if this precinct is simply asleep at the wheel.  I had some sort of protest outside my window with no fewer than 5 air horns being played continuously for over an hour.  I called 311 and filed a noise complaint - I have a business and literally could not operate.  Then I called the precinct directly.  The officer hung up on me.  And this is what I pay taxes for.  Terrible work.  An embarrassment.

Terrible work.  An embarrassment.

originalText.text: A concert is playing at South Street pier and it noise is way too loud. Even with my windows shut + the air-conditioner on I can still hear it. And i live in downtown Brooklyn. I can't believe that the concert promoters are not breaking the law regarding the sound decibels that are allowed. The officiers taking my call where unresponsive + could only make feeble excuses claiming they had a license. But they should not be disturbing people miles away.

originalText.text: There is a ( Black ) man walking down ( south ) on Broadway swinging his arms and fist at as if he wants to hit people in the face for no reason at all !!!! This occurred on January 07, 2017 - Saturday; at around 5:30 pm -- 6:00 pm.  He was talking to himself. He was walking north bound on the east side of Broadway between Liberty and John Streets. He was muscular ( built ); slim and he seemed homeless. ANOTHER SIMILIAR INCIDENT OCCURRED ON THE south bound R and W train platform on December 09, 2016; approximately 8:00 pm. PLEASE DO SOMETHING !!!!!!

originalText.text:
This precinct taught me NYPD like a deli for the rich and connected who dial in fixing and favors.

Under Ed Winski awful w/ exception of a few NYPD that served in the military and let Veteran vendors alone instead of harassing them - FYI-  Korean War Vet Eric who died in Hospice of cancer.  I witnessed NYPD PO Schatz use his car illegally, threateningly, illegal use sirens and harassed Eric who was so handicapped that when Schatz pulled up to so close -  Eric touch the car to maintain his balance and PO Gene Schatz  yelled about respect and get his hands off the car. PO Schatz is in my opinion so messed up - he thinks respect is garnered thru abuse.   A group of vets pointed out to the sicko cop that Eric  is handicapped and he was just touching the car for balance! Schatz pulled the car right up to Eric who was sitting at his table.

Schatz got “promoted” to Community Affairs to work w/ Det Tommy Moran and it turns out their Facebook friends  with the detectives at the 1st Precinct that broke laws at their desk in my case  — Det John Vergona and Detective Andrew Dwyer!  Supervisors party to falsifying police reports coercing  threatening me from the First Precinct at the time DI Ed Winston, Lt Burgos, Sgt Chen.  Ray Kelly and Bratton/Chief Boyce promoted or allowed to corrupt cops to retire because that’s how corrupt internal affairs and 1PP are.

In my opinion it’s 01 precinct is a corrupt precinct that caters to the rich — they do fixing in favors one 800 -NYPD IA DA fix it.

An example 2010 “selective policing” for the Mercer hotel who ran/runs an illegal  parking with valet service in the loading and unloading. The manager of the time we call the police and have them ticket veteran vendors but the cops looked the other way  at the cars luxury vehicles parked for hours in the loading in unloading zone.  The fix is in.

I wonder if palms were/are greased —if they get free golfing, invited to parties, whatever?  It was a corrupt precinct (Mercer hotel still has parking scam so still is corrupt my opinion)  and there were a few good cops mostly veterans but it’s tragically corrupt like 1PP where top cops Ray Kelly, Bratton and O’Neill, Chief of Detectives Boyce  all got caught taking plane rides they shouldn’t taken. O’Neill and Boyce  still free rides on a Cessna that’s federally funded and they use it as a private taxi and they’ve yet to be fired or we in burst the federal funds for those rides.

Google Dr Fagelman assault. 0 arrests!  Watch youtube. In 2012  I was savagely assaulted a hole in my retina cervical damage  + than detectives also broke laws are Facebook friends w/ PO Schatz -  1st cop I ever reported to internal affairs!

I’m waiting for new police commissioner and a mayor is a clean house even if it takes years to find someone w/ integrity. Certain crimes committed in my case have no statute of limitation so how ever long it takes.

Internal Affairs  corrupt and protects the precinct doing fixing and favors.   Guess who investigates corruption inside internal affairs ?

Internal Affairs.

I have video, falsified police reports signed off by Lt Burgos - He opened me up in my case many times but refused to even answer an email when is subordinate gave me his email asking for badge # of  his subordinates breaking laws obstructing justice he, Sgt Chen protected all crimes along with the CO Ed Winski  have audio from inside the 1st Precinct proving that they obstructed justice and a prevented me from reporting crimes the attack via Det John Vergona  violently threatening me over the phone with false arrest and less I drop charges.  He lied in police reports and refused to meet me along with any and all supervisors.

They detectives and supervisors that broke laws head like Ku Klux Klan —  years later I found some of their faces on Facebook but I still don’t know what Sgt Chen/Lt Burgos look like.

I would like all the NYPD IA involved to be questioned in front of permanent new commission into police corruption and if they commit perjury I want them to go to jail for that too.
